title: Historical day for Bitcoin ETFs as BlackRock’s inflow hits a record $788 million
description:
Quick Take Data from BitMEX shows that on March 5, a staggering $648 million inflow was recorded into the US Bitcoin ETFs, which equates to approximately 10,238 BTC. This was the third biggest day in terms of net inflows since trading began. The principal driver was BlackRock IBIT, with a substantial inflow of $788 million, […]

The post Historical day for Bitcoin ETFs as BlackRock’s inflow hits a record $788 million appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Sell, Merge, Or Dissolve: Osprey To Sunset Its OTC Bitcoin Trust
description: The closed-end Bitcoin fund is exploring strategic alternatives like merger or sale to counter the discounted selling point of its units.

title: Wingalaxy Debuts As The First Winner-Takes-All Racing Game On Cronos
description: Blockchain games enthusiasts looking for a high stakes challenge could do a lot worse than to check out Wingalaxy, billed as the first “race-to-win” game to launch on the Cronos blockchain.

title: Binance resolves withdrawal glitch, ensures user fund safety
description: Binance, the global cryptocurrency exchange, successfully resolved a technical glitch that momentarily hindered its crypto withdrawal services. The issue, which caused concern among a vast number of users, was quickly addressed, leading to the restoration of normal withdrawal operations. Binance’s technical team acted swiftly to rectify the problem, ensuring minimal disruption to its trading activities. […]

title: DeFi total value locked(TVL)surpasses $100B mark after nearly two years
description: The total value locked (TVL) in decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols has surpassed the $100 billion mark for the first time in nearly two years, reaching $101.36 billion on March 5. This milestone highlights a notable growth phase within the DeFi ecosystem, reflecting an increase in the sector’s activity and investor engagement. The Block’s Data Dashboard […]

title: Revolutionizing Game Creation: Google DeepMind Unveils Genie
description: In a groundbreaking leap forward for the gaming industry, researchers from Google DeepMind have introduced Genie, heralded as the world’s first generative interactive environment AI. This innovative technology promises to empower gamers to create playable games without programming expertise, marking a significant shift in game development accessibility and democratization. Unveiling Genie: The game-changing AI Genie […]

title: Bitcoin halving approaching; AI altcoin raises over $10m in presale
description: InQubeta has raised over $10 million in its ongoing presale. Meanwhile, Bitcoin is rallying ahead of halving

title: Binance.US under SEC scrutiny for alleged non-compliance in asset custody probe
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) alleges that Binance.US has not responded to important inquiries about customer assets and other critical aspects of an active investigation. The SEC has expressed concerns in a joint status report to a Washington,…

title: Dormant Ethereum Holder Resurfaces; Chainlink AI Rival Becomes a Magnet for Large Investors
description: In an event that has intrigued investors, an Ethereum (ETH) wallet that had been dormant for more than eight years suddenly became active again. It transferred 100 ETH, which is worth about $230,159. This is the first time any activity has occurred in the wallet since it was created in July 2015. This has sparked [...]

title: Pushd (PUSHD) Gains “Decentralized Amazon” Reputation, Attracts More Ethereum (ETH) & Solana (SOL) Investors
description:
